item.title: By: Raptor
item.dc:creator: Raptor
item.description:
Crap ton of whiney teenagers, I stopped reading blizzard forums after I proved 3 seperate ppl completely wrong with comos records & not one acknowledged.
It was sad because 30~ish rogues on forums were arguing with the first level 60 rogue on my server(yes, I had 6 weeks of vaction company wouldn't roll to the new year - so I went to florida for 5 days & played wow rest of time).
item.content:encoded:
Crap ton of whiney teenagers, I stopped reading blizzard forums after I proved 3 seperate ppl completely wrong with comos records & not one acknowledged.

It was sad because 30~ish rogues on forums were arguing with the first level 60 rogue on my server(yes, I had 6 weeks of vaction company wouldn’t roll to the new year – so I went to florida for 5 days & played wow rest of time).

item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description:
They proved us all idiots today. They banned casinos, which was a high priority item for at least a week.
Hmm, now that I think about it, that was kind of like declaring Vanilla a flavor.
item.content:encoded:
They proved us all idiots today. They banned casinos, which was a high priority item for at least a week.

Hmm, now that I think about it, that was kind of like declaring Vanilla a flavor.

item.title: By: Z
item.dc:creator: Z
item.description: If there was a test server, we may never see a patch. It takes them long enough to put an untested patch out...
item.content:encoded: If there was a test server, we may never see a patch. It takes them long enough to put an untested patch out…

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
Typical Blizzard "circle the wagons" bullshit.
At least the AH doesn't lock up anymore . . .
item.content:encoded:
Typical Blizzard “circle the wagons” bullshit.

At least the AH doesn’t lock up anymore . . .
